name: simpleaws
description: The simple idea is to provide a step by step tutorial to get a simple application into Amazon Web Services (AWS).

scripts.test:client: cd client && npm ci && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.test:client:ci: cd client && npm ci && npm run lint && npm run test:ci
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.test:server: cd server && npm ci && npm test
scripts.docker:build: (npm run docker:server) && (npm run build:client) && (npm run docker:client)
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:build && docker-compose -p simple_aws_cloud up

author: MaFo
